svg.style: font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; background-color: white; text-rendering: optimizeLegibility; -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;

text.tspan: GDP per capita vs. child mortality, 2013
Colours represent world regions. Bubble sizes are proportional the total country population.
Source: Penn World Table 9.0 - OWID's team calculations, Our World in Data based on Human Mortality Database and UN Child Mortality
